website_summaries.verdict: A compact and inexpensive coffee maker that makes it easy to make single cups of coffee with your favorite ground coffee.
pros: Makes up to 14 ounces of coffee with your favorite ground coffee
Includes a permanent filter and a removable storage brew basket for easy cleaning
The drip tray is adjustable so you can adjust for your specific cup without splashing
cons: Does not have an auto shut-off feature
Some experienced the permanent filter breaking, but the company is happy to replace for free

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty!
customer_reviews.text: Brought this into the office today. My coworkers and I are very pleased with this coffee maker. The coffee comes out very hot and not watered down. So far so good. Definitely recommend. Love the compact size.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this machine October 2014. It is still running strong March 2017! I use it almost every weekday. I can't calculate how much money I have saved over buying coffee at work cafe for $2 a cup, or coffee shop for more. The permanent filter is starting to show a few tiny tears, so I may have to switch to paper filters, as I don't see a way to buy the permanent filter basket online.
customer_reviews.author: J_Sant

customer_reviews.title: this happens when it's like 32 days old
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about 3 weeks, then just didn't turn on one morning. Called the company, had to call back 4 times after seeming infinite hold music (over 2 hours one time), finally got a person. Their response, "return it to amazon". Of course, this happens when it's like 32 days old, so now Amazon won't take it back. Didn't last, crappy support, buy another product from someone else. On the plus side, was a dream for those 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bicknell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly we were ready to purchase an expensive, fancy dual coffee maker with a single serve option. (I really wanted something that also serves as a tea/hot water maker). I could justify spending a ton of money just for a hot water, single server feature... so I settled on this inexpensive machine. It's perfect. Also other reviews state it takes 5 minutes for 1 cup. This is not true for the machine we recieved. It starts brewing in about 5 to 10 seconds and a full cup is ready within 2 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: No Auto Shutoff!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cool little coffee maker. WAY WAY better than the stupid pod things that turn your ten cent cup of coffee into a major financial investment. But.... there's not auto shutoff. I just can't recommend a product of this type because I'm used to walking away from the coffee pot because I know it will shut off. Now, even thought I like the whole idea of the thing, I'm totally programmed to walk away from it and it seems like a fire hazard to me that the heating unit is going to be on... indefinitely . Put the AUTO-OFF feature in and I'm a customer. FOR SURE!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Potter

customer_reviews.title: Makes a weak coffee!
customer_reviews.text: My family and I have used a one cup coffee maker for years (the same maker). Then our coffee maker began to show it’s age, and so we opted for this new and sleeker-looking option. It is easy to use and clean, and it’s sold for a good price. The coffee is even nice and hot. However, the coffee is significantly weaker. The water is pushed through the coffee grounds and filter much to quickly. We end up not feeling satisfied with our morning coffee ritual. We’ve tried using more coffee grounds in the filter, but that effort doesn’t strengthen the flavor. We are going back to our old coffee maker!
customer_reviews.author: myrtle

customer_reviews.title: Died in less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this July 2017. Liked it all right, it served its purpose, until it stopped working this week. For whatever reason, it only makes a quarter to half a cup while sputtering and making horrible noise the whole time. I have to replace it because I need my morning coffee! The frequency of use: Used daily. Each morning, Monday through Friday for 1 cup. Each morning Saturday and Sunday, 1 to 2 cups.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Mixed review.
customer_reviews.text: We didn't use this pot when we bought it, but waited until my husband went out of town for work. When I took it out of the box, I noticed something white on the lid that holds it down. Someone had evidently used this, broke it, and sent it back. This is the coffee we received. I'm very disappointed in someone for not checking this. I don't expect a new pot after several years, but just wanted to make someone aware that returns need to be checked better. I've ordered alot from Amazon and have generally been very happy, but not with this. I'm glad it wasn't an expensive item.
customer_reviews.author: Martha B Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: YES for me!
customer_reviews.text: K-cups are bad for the environment, this is not K cup but it is single serve. Coffee is expense and it's been hard for me to measure correctly for diff't sized pots. This does not waste coffee. I found 1 Tablespoon of coffee works for me. And if I don't want anymore, I don't have a pot of coffee to toss out. Even tho this is a cheap plastic machine I have a Bella slow cooker. Bella is good.
customer_reviews.author: Val Turquoise

customer_reviews.title: Peferfect little coffee maker.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little guy. Coffee maker is just perfect for that one cup of coffee. Easy to use and clean. Coffee starts poring in about a minute, really! I use 2 nice scoops for my approx 10 oz mugs. Temperature comes out just right. I'm having my 2nd cup like right now. Just caution. It does not have auto shut off, so just make sure to turn it off after you are done. Nice quality and does not take up much room in kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive
customer_reviews.text: Description says "The drip tray adjusts to accommodate various size mugs, such as the ceramic mug included with this coffee maker: Lies NO mug included and it cannot accomodate a typical travel mug. Mug must be no more than 6 inches tall. I purchased to prepare coffee to take with me in a travel mug but it doesn't fit so this will be going back.
customer_reviews.author: Nannax3

customer_reviews.title: Garbage with horrible warranty service
customer_reviews.text: It was fine for the first few months. 7 months in, the drip stopped working and the water all escaped as steam through the back with barely a few drops of coffee coming out. I reached out to the warranty people and its been over 2 weeks without any response. I sent them all the info needed, pictures and even a video of what it's doing. I rarely write negative reviews, especially if the mfg takes care of the issue, but their lack of response is unacceptable. Don't waste your time or money on this.
customer_reviews.author: YD

customer_reviews.title: Good, not as good as prior version
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for an earlier bella one cup which I loved. I had left used grounds in the filter over a weekend when I went away and they got moldy so I needed a replacement filter. Extremely aggravating that this cannot be purchased separately, and I couldn't find any other filter that worked. Broke down and replaced whole unit. This one is not tall enough to accomodate a travel mug, ugg. Otherwise fine, very convenient and eco-friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: I give a good review to this for the first one I purchased and my dad accidentally threw away the filter so I had to buy another. Within one month of purchase water began to leak heavily out the back on the bottom of the unit making it an electrical danger. Would not recommend. Threw it away and switched to a French press for about the same $.
customer_reviews.author: Joliecajun

customer_reviews.title: A little wonder
customer_reviews.text: I'm the only coffee drinker and I love a good cup in the morning. This works perfect for me and it even allows for a larger cup if I want. If you only want a cup the bottom, which is a tray to catch drips, lifts and secures higher so there will be no splash. It does not have a warming plate so don't expect it to stay hot if you don't prepare the coffee right away but it does stay on, it does not turn off as my last one did. But this does not take anything away from just how great this little wonder works. I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Felix/ John Pytel

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for the minimalist  coffee drinkers.
customer_reviews.text: Very compact... beautiful simplistic design... rinse only “mesh” wire filter! This is 2nd Bella One-Scoop Coffee Maker - my first having lasted about 2 years. Far from the coffee addict, I enjoy a single cup of coffee in the mornings, and an additional cup-to-go on my work mornings. Love receiving a full cup of STEAMING HOT coffee made to perfection in less than 5 minutes time. Biggest bonus is not having to ever clean coffee maker and/or replace any filters. Not all sized travel mugs will fit under spout. Mine does not, but for me that aspect is a minor one.
customer_reviews.author: DMA

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 4 months, now barely makes half a cup
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker worked absolutely great for about four months, but starting yesterday, it doesn't matter if I put a full cup of water in it, it will only make a half cup or less of coffee. I'm not sure if it's got a pump that's gone bad or what, but a coffee maker should last more than 4 months. Too late to return it or ask for support, so I'll be buying a new one, I guess, but definitely avoiding this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R. Haslip

customer_reviews.title: Love my Bella coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: My son got me a Bella a couple of years ago. I bought one for him this year. I don't drink much coffee so this is just perfect for the rare times that I want real coffee at home. I love that it is lightweight and I can clean it easily. Plus it makes coffee as weak or as strong as you want....I like mine on the weaker side.
customer_reviews.author: mollysmom

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this almost six months ago. I was really loving it. I don't drink alot of coffee, so i enjoyed being able to make one cup at a time and that I could easily make oatmeal with it. However, just a few days ago, it started leaking and the aesthetic silver paneling started to come undone from the base. Then a day later, it stopped brewing altogether. And of course, it's too late to exchange it. What a waste of $20.
customer_reviews.author: Angela S

customer_reviews.title: It stopped working!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this coffee machine of of the reviews. I need a small coffee maker for my office to prevent me from stopping to buy coffee every morning and the price was more than reasonable. After about 2 months it stopped working. Steam would just spurt out and no water. I cleaned it twice and still the same issue. I would like to return it but now it's past the return date and I still need to buy another machine. I wouldn't say don't purchase, it was good while it lasted I just wish it lasted longer than 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Tressie tillar

customer_reviews.title: Only good for a month
customer_reviews.text: Wish I read all review before purchasing this, you absolutely get what you pay for with this little thing. It works for the first month really well, then after that you get half a cup of coffee every time and the water reservoir is half full with water even after you leave it on for 30min to brew. Something to do with the tank not pushing the water through...either way, threw this into the trash a month in and purchased another more reliable coffee maker. Get this if you only need this for a month at most. Also the coffee didn't' taste that great, I think the water doesn't get hot enough, a real shame, loved the size of this.
customer_reviews.author: Reema

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for one-person use.
customer_reviews.text: Great little coffee maker. Likely will not hold up in a frequent use setting such as an office, lounge, commons area, etc. But it is perfect for my personal, daily use. Easy to clean, heats water fast, and brews a hot cup of coffee with minimal fuss. I put it next to my 8" grinder to show its small and convenient size.
customer_reviews.author: Liza Cas

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Never used. Arrived without basket or backer holder. Called Bella and asked for replacement for baskets but they said no. I offered to BUY replacement parts but they said no again. I called Walmart and they gave me a full refund. I’d never buy Bella Products again, but WALMART as usual was great about it.
customer_reviews.author: Nana M.

customer_reviews.title: Called company and they said they would refund (takes 6-8 weeks) Highly do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: My brand new Bella Coffee Maker just quit after making one cup of coffee. I have owned three of these in the past five years. They were cheap and delivered an okay cup of coffee. However, not investing any more money with this company. Time to try another brand. Called company and they said they would refund (takes 6-8 weeks) Highly do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Diva D

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a Month
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this coffee maker, it broke within a month, has two year warranty and they are very difficult to deal with even though the item is clearly covered. They are asking for videos and photos of the coffee maker, apparently my word that a $20 coffee maker doesn't work isn't good enough. The hassle over a $20 coffee maker isn't worth it and I assume the people at Bella know that too. They take my money, and I get a broken Coffee maker and for $20 they hope I don't push it. Don't buy this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Funphoneguy

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Time Buying
customer_reviews.text: When it work, it splatters over my desk and today the water doesn't drain, I look at the water and its sitting with color to it meaning grinds is in the base some how.. and course I cant return it the return date expired June 4th and today is June 7th. WOW
customer_reviews.author: Black Princess

customer_reviews.title: THAT YOU CAN TUST ANYTHING ON LINE WHEN YOU BUY THORUGH AMAZON.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited that I ordered this on Friday and received it on Sunday. I will tell everyone I know to buy from Amazon. I also received a cat toy yesterday and today I am buying another. Can't say enough about Amazon. Blessings Rev. Renee I just took the bella out of the box. I had purchased one a year ago and a few days ago I accidently threw out the cup that is for the coffee scoop. So instead of going to bella and purchased the item I want on line and bought the one scoop coffee maker and tea maker. Couldn't be happier. Blessings, Renee
customer_reviews.author: Rev Renee

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and convenient size! My husband is the only one in our household who drinks coffee, so we thought this would be a perfect coffee maker. It is a space saver and leaves us with no "extra" coffee that simply gets poured down the drain. The permanent filter is AMAZING!!!! We have had this product for 8 months (used approximately 4 times a week) and have had absolutely no issues with it. I would certainly recommend to anyone looking for a single cup of coffee!
customer_reviews.author: HeidiB

customer_reviews.title: Single cup coffee machine
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this coffee machine for a little less than 2 months and am happy with it so far. The coffee brews quickly and tastes great. I like the movable plate that allows for using a standard mug or tall mug without coffee splattering everywhere. The down side is that if you use more than the recommended level of coffee grounds (in an attempt to make stronger coffee) the grounds tend to spill all over the inside of the machine. However it is easy to clear the machine of grounds when this happens. Overall, I am very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Mom

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until it didn't! It worked fine for four months then one morning I tried to brew my coffee and NOTHING! Light is on but nothing is happening. Very disappointed this maker didn't last longer than 4 months. I am currently waiting for a reply back from Bella customer service, hope their service is better than the product! Update: After speaking with customer service I was informed they would offer a refund after I submit a reciept, copy product info onto a sheet of paper and cut and mail in plug, at my expense. I asked for a replacement instead and was told they were out of my particular model..in every color..of course.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect single serve coffee machine
customer_reviews.text: We've had this machine for over a month and absolutely love it. It could not be easier to use. We were using a Keurig but switched because using cups every morning is pretty wasteful. This machine is nearly as quick and simple as that but without the cups. I actually prefer the taste to a Keurig.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Small maker for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee maker because it makes a personal cup of coffee for however strong you want to make the cup. I also love how small it is to fit into a small kitchen or kitchen spaces. It has a reusable coffee filter where you can dump the coffee grounds and then rinse the filter with water. I have had to buy several of these as they do not seem to hold up and will break on me by not sucking up the water. Not sure if there is a way to fix that when it happens, but I just buy another one since it's so cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Buhr

customer_reviews.title: Taste- This machine will take a good grind of coffee and make it unrecognizable.
customer_reviews.text: I have used my favorite grind of Starbucks (Pike Place) coffee wih this coffee brewer, only to find that it bromes a mediocre tasteless drink. Secondly, this machine does not seem capable of making a reasonably hot cup of coffee. The result is, you have a warm cup of java in no time at all. Addendum: Six and 1/2 months since purchase, this coffee maker has failed to function. Adding 12 oz of water to the resevoir, the coffee maker delivers 3-4 oz. of brew. This is after performing the recommended de-scaling procedures on a roitne basis. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Glen R Wherfel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This little coffee maker is exactly what I needed! I had a keurig maker for 5 years and everytime i tried coffee somewhere else felt my coffee from my keurig tasted generic! My keurig finally crapped out so i ordered this little maker! For $15 what else could you ask for! I can choose how strong or weak I want my coffee unlike with my keurig. If it were to break id order another almost a month of owning and daily use and it's working great!
customer_reviews.author: les2788

customer_reviews.title: Just the best in everyway!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a simple, easy to clean, fast, hot cup of coffee every morning with no fuss! I got just that!! Please don't look down your nose on this little baby. It stands on it's own next to the wasteful $100.00 coffee makers. Oh by the way...the coffee tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: nancy smith

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after only 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: This product was ok until it completely stopped working after only three months. We purchased this coffee maker in April and it stopped working at the beginning of September. The water no longer flows through the coffee beans into the cup, rendering the product useless.
customer_reviews.author: CEM

customer_reviews.title: Nice Small Coffee Maker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this coffee maker for when I feel like a single cup of coffee. It uses regular coffee and it brews very nicely. It does not come with a mug so I used a Copco 14oz travel mug that fits perfect. You can use it with any coffee mug but I like to use it with my travel mug. I also like the reusable coffee filter.
customer_reviews.author: Garyd

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Loved this little coffee maker until it stopped working 7 months after purchase. Water stays in the reserve will not brew more than 1/4 of a cup. I cleaned it twice using 1/3 White vinegar 2/3 water. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Langston

customer_reviews.title: Started smoking
customer_reviews.text: I had this machine for less than a month. I loved it at first. It is easy to clean and the filter works just fine. After less than a month, it started smoking and I could smell it burning. So dangerous! No thanks. I do not recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: nita

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!  got too hot, stopped water flow
customer_reviews.text: We had a Bella for several years, but it stopped heating. This new one gets too hot, makes about 1/2 mug at a time, then shuts off. I had in RV and did not use for a while so missed the window to return. Today made 1 cup, but machine too hot to make another. My husband drinks regular; I drink decaf. Not useful to us. will go to a more expensive machine. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Bob Burkett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!! One cup coffee maker.
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! Excellent one cup coffee maker. I had one and I was so happy with it that I just bought another one for my work. The coffee taste great and it makes the cup of coffee very quickly. I even thing that this is better than the expensive one. Super great price. I'm sharing this information with my coworkers. They are ordering this One cup Coffee Maker too.
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy, single cup coffee maker.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I were tired of wasting so much coffee so we decided to switch over to a single cup coffee maker. I'm extremely happy with the purchase so far. If I had to find a complaint it's probably the filter screen for the coffee. It's flimsy, and it seems as though we might break it eventually if we aren't careful. Other than that, this is a great buy, especially for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Kaveh M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much, I bought it twice
customer_reviews.text: This would be my second time purchasing it. I wouldn’t have bought a new one if I weren’t so clumsy. The first one I’ve had for over a year or two now that I think about it, and recently I dropped it and it started to mess up. I knew I needed to get the same exact machine because it was truly that inconvenient for me and super easy. Which is my reason for buying the same one.
customer_reviews.author: New universe

customer_reviews.title: Great little Coffee Pot
customer_reviews.text: I adore this little coffee pot. It makes one cup at a time, flavor is good and the coffee comes out nice and hot. The whole thing is quite compact so it doesn’t take up a lot of space which is a huge plus for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mdvlwnch1

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: ordered for husband in order to make one cup of coffee at a time. If you do not want a one cup pod coffee maker I would suggest this coffee maker. Light weight, does not take up lots of counter space. If have to weight 15 minutes before making second cup. However, if one person is making coffee this is not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just stops working after 1yr
customer_reviews.text: i first got this as a gift. and it was so easy to use. i use it mainly to heat up water for tea. it stopped working after a bit over a year. no reason why. i bought one for myself b/c it was convenient to use. but that just stopped working too. again, no idea why. it lasted about 10 months. for a product that just heats up water on average 3 to 4 days per week, it should last years. i do not recommend buying after this repeat experience. it's wasteful to buy a new machine every year.
customer_reviews.author: MTP

customer_reviews.title: Great little coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a quick single serve that you use with ground coffee instead of expensive kcups. I prefer this over our Keurig!
customer_reviews.author: Sm

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee
customer_reviews.text: This coffee pot makes the best coffee and it's nice to just make one cup at a time. It's so much less expensive than using the pods.
customer_reviews.author: Baijji

customer_reviews.title: simple and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Present for my mom who was always telling me that she was wasting coffee because she made half a pot a day. She isn't very technical person and I felt this was simple for her to use. I also knew she wouldn't like using kcups because they are expensive compared to regular coffee so the other kind wasn't a good idea. She said it was easy to use and really liked that it came out much hotter then a regular coffee maker. She is now 76 and her eye sight isn't very good but found this to be easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: mara livingstonokeefe

customer_reviews.title: Not that durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to take with me for a study abroad that I’m doing and the top was already broken when it came out of the box. Such a disappointment. I still use it even though it doesn’t close properly but the coffee taste is really good and it’s definitely gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Xana

customer_reviews.title: I love this coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee maker. Its just the right size. I live alone and like my coffee brewed one cup at a time and unlike the kuerig makers, I can adjust my strength.
customer_reviews.author: Margie McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Se do so love the Keurig but couldn't afford one so we thought ...
customer_reviews.text: This was just not what it was advertised to be. We used it a couple weeks and made one cup of coffee a day and one day it wouldn't push the water through it. Nothing would come out. It had to be thrown away and we went back to our old one. Se do so love the Keurig but couldn't afford one so we thought this would be the closest thing but I guess you get what you pay for. No fault of yours and we enjoyed it while it lasted. Thank you, Mona Brown
customer_reviews.author: Mona Brown

customer_reviews.title: Liked it, but it broke 3 weeks later
customer_reviews.text: We really liked this coffee maker. It is compact and easy to use. We make 2-3 single cups of coffee per day. We used this for about 3 weeks and then it suddenly stopped working. It was only $13, but I expected it to last longer than that. I'm not even sure it would be worth the hassle of returning as we don't have the original box.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett1211

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a one person cup and easy to prepare and clean and maintain Wish cord wrapped inside, but we can't get it all. I think for my use it will last for quite some time, unless something really weird goes wrong, but if I use it as instructed it will be great. This is a good first coffee maker for anyone new to coffee or needs a single amount. I also love that it comes with a mug.
customer_reviews.author: GreenApple

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: This is my third one, love them as i travel and send a lot of time in hotels. Just do NOT put hot water in it, for whatever reason that’s the kiss of death for these.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps, temperature is for making hot chocolate.
customer_reviews.text: ". . . such as the ceramic mug included with this coffee maker." Missing ceramic mug. Brewing temperature for 6 oz. is 184°F, and for 12 oz. is 164°F. ;o( Below the National Coffee Association of U.S.A. (NCA) recommended water temperature between 195°F to 205°F. Keeping this for brewing green tea. Amazon customer 'chat' is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Online again

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I brought this machine for my mother-in-law as a Christmas gift. She loved it so much and used t every day to make her tea or coffee. Now it’s been 1 years and a month later the machine stop working on her. Made me disappointed that now she doesn’t have a working machine.
customer_reviews.author: Melly

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine
customer_reviews.text: Great little machine! I've been using it every morning since Christmas and am very happy with it. My fancy pod machine died, and since I was scooping ground coffee into a reusable pod instead of using the disposable single use pods anyway, I was glad to find this economical replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Makes my perfect cup of Joe, my way.
customer_reviews.text: I got this coffee maker for my office at work. Boxing was perfect... the product is excellent.. really like that it’s adjustable for regular or tall coffee cups. It was difficult to find a one-cup coffee maker that didn’t use pods.. this uses good old fashioned coffee grounds. Works fine so far. If it breaks down, I’ll update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Josh M..

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Bought it initially to travel but it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this neat one cup pot since September and have used it everyday, sometimes twice. I love it. Bought it initially to travel but it is now my main staple. The filter for coffee is a little flimsy but all you have to do is clean it and handle with care. Update.........Here we are in May 2018. My little Bella is still going strong. Have used everyday and still makes one of the best cups of coffee ever. When you figure how inexpensive this coffee pot is verses how many great cups of coffee I have had, you cannot go wrong. Even if it breaks or have issues, I have gotten my money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Was good while it lasted...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE DEC 2017 - worked for 5 months (used 3x per week). Disappointed in durability! Have attempted to contact Bella. More to come.... Jul 2017: Perfect for a single that doesn’t like pods!!
customer_reviews.author: JCR

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Switched to save space and I love having the ability to make one fresh cup at a time. Very happy. Quality is amazing. Very easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: derek johnson

customer_reviews.title: Bella coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I like it cause it small and so cute .work fine easy to clean and has a filter cup no paper cup. Just brought one for my friend as well 😊
customer_reviews.author: Rose M leon

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I think I have only made less than 50 cups of coffee with this device and it isn’t working now. Very bad design that malfunctions that quickly. Definitely not work the money.

product_meta.title: BELLA (14436) One Scoop One Cup Coffee Maker, Black and Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Color:Black and Stainless SteelWith it's compact design and sleekish design, the BELLA One Scoop One Cup coffee and tea maker will be your best friend in the mornings. Operation is simpe. Just add your favorite ground coffee or loose leaf tea, press the button and in minutes you will be enjoying a perfect cup of bold coffee or tea. feature_bullets: EFFICIENT & EASY: This single cup coffee maker features a dishwasher safe permanent filter so you'll never need paper filters again. The 14-oz water tank & adjustable drip tray lets you brew a delicious cup in minutes with minimal cleanup

SPACE SAVER: A great choice for smaller kitchens, offices, studios & dorms, the One Scoop One Cup Coffee Maker has a compact, streamlined design that won't clutter a countertop. You can also use it to make hot water for tea, hot chocolate, oatmeal & more

SAVOR THE QUALITY: Our one cup coffee makers brew you a rich, delicious single cup of java with quickness & convenience. They feature compact, space-saving design & durable, easy to clean components, plus earth-friendly dishwasher safe reusable filters

KITCHEN ESSENTIALS: BELLA offers a full range of high-quality products including air fryers, waffle irons, toasters, coffee makers, electric kettles, slow cookers, espresso machines, griddles & juicers.

MIX IT UP: The kitchen should be fun. With BELLA It can be. We provide you with quick & convenient kitchen solutions to simplify your hectic life, including small kitchen appliances, cookware & housewares.

With 600 Watts of power, this single-serve coffee maker is ideal for quick pick-me-ups. The 14-ounce water tank lets you brew a generous cup with ground coffee. The coffee maker also produces hot water for instant oatmeal or soup, bagged or loose tea, powdered hot chocolate, or apple cider.

A great choice for smaller kitchens, offices, and dorm rooms, the One Scoop One Cup Coffee Maker has a compact, streamlined design that won't clutter your space. Its smaller footprint also makes it easier to store in a cabinet or pantry.
With this coffee maker, you'll never need disposal paper filters. The permanent filter has a removable brew basket that collects the used coffee grounds, so you can toss them in the garbage.

Featuring a hinged lid for access to the filter and water tank, this coffee maker is easy to operate and requires minimal care and maintenance. An on/off button on the side of the coffee maker gets things going, while an illuminated rocker switch allows you to stop the brewing process. The drip tray adjusts to accommodate various size mugs, such as the ceramic mug included with this coffee maker.
To clean the filter basket, simply give it a quick rinse after use. To clean the filter, use its handle to remove it from the basket. The filter is dishwasher safe.
